title: Celtic 3-0 Rangers
shortDescription: Highlights of the Scottish Premiership match between Celtic and Rangers.

title: GVB left fuming with Rangers | 'Celtic laid down a marker'
shortDescription: Giovanni van Bronckhorst was left fuming with his Rangers team after their first-half Old Firm capitulation against Celtic.

title: Chelsea ease past Man Utd to reach Women's League Cup final
shortDescription: Chelsea stayed on course for a third-successive Continental League Cup triumph after beating Manchester United 3-1 in their semi-final on Wednesday.

title: Celtic go top with dominant Rangers win
shortDescription: Celtic blew Rangers away in the second Old Firm clash of the season to move top of the Scottish Premiership with a 3-0 win.

title: Holmes and Rhodes strike late to break Derby resistance
shortDescription: Two late goals handed Huddersfield a deserved 2-0 win against a Derby side who played for 87 minutes with 10 men.

title: Ikpeazu scores on debut as Cardiff edge Barnsley
shortDescription:
On-loan Cardiff substitute Uche Ikpeazu secured a 1-0 Championship victory at
bottom side Barnsley, just eight minutes into his debut for the Welsh club.

title: Mane fires Senegal into AFCON final
shortDescription: Sadio Mane's 87th-minute goal ensured Senegal's place in the Africa Cup of Nations final as they survived a late Burkina Faso fight-back to win 3-1.

title: Bruce to WBA: A backward step, or best chance of promotion?
shortDescription: In the space of a few hours, West Brom have ripped up the entirety of their plans and started again. They've sacked their head coach, and their Chief Executive.

title: Geraldo Bajrami: From warzone to facing West Ham in FA Cup
shortDescription: Kidderminster defender Geraldo Bajrami has faced a 'different' journey to facing West Ham in FA Cup fourth round on Saturday.

title: How Alli and Van de Beek can both fit at Everton
shortDescription: A cloud has been lifted at Everton, but one of Frank Lampard's first tasks is finding a way of making  Donny van de Beek and Dele Alli work effectively in the same team.

title: Aulas wants to bring Arsenal's Lacazette back to Lyon
shortDescription: Lyon president Jean-Michel Aulas has confirmed the club's interest in re-signing Alexandre Lacazette from Arsenal this summer.

title: Bruce in advanced talks to become West Brom head coach
shortDescription: West Brom are in advanced talks to appoint former Newcastle manager Steve Bruce as their new head coach following the sacking of Valerian Ismael.

title: Notebook: Newcastle spend brings no survival guarantee
shortDescription: Sky Sports News reporter Keith Downie analyses how Newcastle's January spending spree strengthens their bid to avoid the drop.

title: Elanga's rise to prominence at Man Utd
shortDescription: Anthony Elanga was a regular presence in Manchester United's first-team squad in January and could be set for a bright future at Old Trafford.

title: Mendy faces new attempted rape charge
shortDescription: Manchester City footballer Benjamin Mendy has appeared in court to face a new allegation of attempted rape.

title: Sturgeon calls for SPFL to take action on Goodwillie signing
shortDescription: Nicola Sturgeon has called on the SPFL to take action after Raith Rovers' controversial decision to sign David Goodwillie.

title: 'We did it!' Lampard greets Dele Alli
shortDescription: New Everton manager Frank Lampard greets transfer deadline day signing Dele Alli. (Pictures: Everton TV)

title: Aubameyang: My target is Champions League football
shortDescription: Barcelona have officially signed Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang on a free transfer from Arsenal, with the striker joining on a three-and-a-half-year deal.

title: Greenwood released on bail pending further investigation
shortDescription: Manchester United footballer Mason Greenwood has been released on bail pending further investigation.

title: Spurs join UN Race to Zero; pledge to go net zero by 2040
shortDescription: Tottenham have unveiled plans to halve their carbon emissions by 2030 and become net carbon zero by 2040 after joining the UN Race to Zero initiative.
